item.title: EU leaders meet to talk defense but Trump and his tariffs loom large
item.description: European leaders are gathering to discuss defense â€” but the latest moves by U.S. President Donald Trump will loom large over the meeting.

item.title: Rubio tells Panama to end China's influence of canal or face U.S. action
item.description: Marco Rubio warned Panama's President that Washington will act if Panama does not end what Trump sees as China's influence and control over the Panama...

item.title: SEC's Republican-led commission tightens oversight of probes, sources say
item.description: SEC lawyers have been told they need to seek permission from the politically appointed leadership before formally launching probes.

item.title: 'It doesn't have to be this way': Canada, Mexico, China and the EU respond to Trump's tariffs
item.description: Canada, Mexico and China responded to Trump's long-promised tariffs on imports, with Canada immediately retaliating. The EU also weighed in with its r...

item.title: Ontario to remove U.S. alcohol from shelves after Trump's tariffs announcement
item.description: The Liquor Control Board of Ontario will remove American alcohol from its shelves in response to U.S. President Trump's tariffs on Canada.
